11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed narrated:"Azl was mentined before the Messenger of Allah and he said: 'Why would one of you do that?

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْعَزْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Azl Being Disliked
